item.title: Objectives
item.description: Learn about Relative Paths and why they are important

item.title: Agenda
item.description: Discuss Relative Paths Complete Relative Paths exercise

item.title: Overview
item.description: Relative Paths Relative URLs can be used when linking to pages and files within your own website. Shorthand way of telling the browser where to find your files. Inform students that they have already seen this is use with the link tag when referencing a css file Example Project with Multiple Folders/Files Navigating within the Same Folder Linking from music index page to the music reviews page
